[PARAMETER(false)] --> No Setting just for code generation
[CLONE2INVERTED(false)]

[ANALOGVALUE()]

[UNIT()]
[LIMITMIN(0)]
[LIMITMAX(15)]
[DECIMALDIGITS()]
[SECTION(Com Serial Config)]
[DISABLEAUTO(true)]
[BUTTONMODE()]

[INPUTINVERTED(false)]
[INPUTDELAY(0)]
[INPUTMODE(digital)]
[RELATED_PARAMETERS()]
[PAIRCHECK(true)]
[PAIRCHECKGROUP(15)]
[ZONETYPE(inout)] --> No Setting just for code generation
[ZONENAME(Connect)] --> No Setting just for code generation

[INVERTED(false)]

all Input + all Output
*********************** Cmz ***********************
